This is a great game I highly recommend. But if you decide to play this game seriously you need to get FACEIT or ESEA. This game wont die, has an unlimited skill ceiling and is always a good game. Matchmaking has a lot of cheaters tho

only 2,000 hours to learn fluent russian? would buy again.

November 25, 2019: If you stand still, you shoot right on target for your crosshair. If you walk 3 milimeters your aim will extremely spread more than any other shotgun universally. Very "UNIQUE AIMING SYSTEM" in my opinion.

June 17, 2020: My bullets either faze through or make a circle around an enemy in my crosshair point blank. Even when i use a sniper and IT IS NOT BLURRY, I still don't hit my target AND  when i stand completely still or crouched when me and the enemy have a face-off with two snipers I hear the bullet leave the chamber of my gun on the enemy and he also snipes me. And even though i hear the gunshot from MY weapon, nothing happened he's still alive... I'd feel a little better if you can trade in this game rather than having a "ping contest" for 1 person to live

By the way, i didn't know you have to aim with a shotgun as well. I'm amazed
